 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצַר‎</span><sub>46</sub> **verb** ==restrain, retain== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; compare probably Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***eƒêru***</u></abbr>, ***retain, restrain***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 122</sup> Jäger<sup>BAS i. 483</sup> [[BDB#Zehnpf|Zehnpf]]<sup>ib. 500</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***press***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצַר‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); **\*\***compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***usƒurtu***</u></abbr>, ***taboo*** SAC<sup>JA, 1904, 754</sup>. — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.20.18|Gen 20:18]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצָרַנִי‎</span> [[Gen.16.2|Gen 16:2]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצַרְתִּי‎</span> [[Dan.10.8|Dan 10:8]]; [[Dan.10.16|Dan 10:16]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְצֹר‎</span> [[1Sam.9.17|1Sam 9:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְצָרֿ‎</span> [[2Chr.2.5|2Chr 2:5]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲצָרְכָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.44|1Kgs 18:44]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצֹר‎</span> [[Gen.20.18|Gen 20:18]], construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעִצֹר‎</span> [[2Chr.22.9|2Chr 22:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַעְצֹר‎</span> [[Job.4.2|Job 4:2]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:28b»§ 28b</sup>); ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצוּר‎</span> [[Jer.33.1|Jer 33:1]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***restrain***, with accusative of person [[Gen.16.2|Gen 16:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, i.e. prevent), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצֹר עָצַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵד כָּלרֶֿחֶם‎</span> [[Gen.20.18|Gen 20:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), compare absolute [[Isa.66.9|Isa 66:9]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלִיד‎</span>); followed by infinitive [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]] with accusative of person alone [[1Kgs.18.44|1Kgs 18:44]] ***hinder, stop***; with accusative of sky (hindering rain) [[Deut.11.17|Deut 11:17]]; [[2Chr.7.13|2Chr 7:13]] passive participle absolute ***shut up***, or ***hindered*** (for reasons not given) [[Jer.36.5|Jer 36:5]]; [[Neh.6.10|Neh 6:10]] (? by a vow, or by ceremonial uncleanness, compare Rs<sup>Sem i. 436 f., 2nd ed. 455 f.</sup>); = ***shut up*** (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, in prison) [[2Kgs.17.4|2Kgs 17:4]], passive participle [[Jer.33.1|Jer 33:1]]; [[Jer.39.15|Jer 39:15]], figurative [[Jer.20.9|Jer 20:9]] on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצוּר וְעָזוּב‎</span> (5 t.) see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזב‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצֻרָה לָנוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.21.6|1Sam 21:6]] women have been ***kept away*** with reference to us (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>l.c</sup>.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצוּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> [[1Chr.12.1|1Chr 12:1]] ***kept away from before*** Saul; = ***detain***, with accusative [[Judg.13.15|Judg 13:15]]; [[Judg.13.16|Judg 13:16]] in Job with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמִלִּין‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Job.4.2|Job 4:2]], compare [[Job.29.9|Job 29:9]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמַּיִם‎</span> [[Job.12.5|Job 12:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַמִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.9.17|1Sam 9:17]] is ***rule over***, etc. (si vera lectio); insert also (with other words) [[1Sam.10.1|1Sam 10:1]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others 

**2.** (late) ***retain***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּחַ‎</span> [[2Chr.13.20|2Chr 13:20]]; [[2Chr.22.9|2Chr 22:9]]; [[Dan.10.8|Dan 10:8]]; [[Dan.10.16|Dan 10:16]]; [[Dan.11.6|Dan 11:6]] + infinitive = ***be able to*** [[1Chr.29.14|1Chr 29:14]]; [[2Chr.2.5|2Chr 2:5]] omit <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּחַ‎</span> [[2Chr.14.10|2Chr 14:10]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמְּךָ‎</span>), [[2Chr.20.37|2Chr 20:37]] (+ infinitive). **Niph\`al** ***be restrained, stayed***, of plague: Perfect 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעֱצָ֑רָה‎</span> [[Num.17.15|Num 17:15]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּעָצַר‎</span> [[2Sam.24.27|2Sam 24:27]] = [[1Chr.21.22|1Chr 21:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּעָצַר‎</span> [[Num.17.13|Num 17:13]]; [[Num.25.8|Num 25:8]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[2Sam.24.25|2Sam 24:25]]; [[Ps.106.30|Ps 106:30]] ***be shut up*** (of sky), ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֵעָצֵר‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.35|1Kgs 8:35]] = [[2Chr.6.26|2Chr 6:26]] ***be under restraint*** or ***detention Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְצָר‎</span> [[1Sam.21.8|1Sam 21:8]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְחנֵי י‎</span> (? i.e. kept by a vow, compare [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] and [[Neh.6.10|Neh 6:10]] above).
